description: Your physical mastery grants you an impossible stride.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Acrobatics 6 ranks, Climb 6 ranks, monk level 6th.

sections.text: As a move action, you can move up to half your slow fall distance across a wall or ceiling or across ropes, branches, or even water or other surfaces that cannot support your weight. You must reach a solid, level surface by the end of your turn or you will fall.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Spider Step
